TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Guangfu, title = Guangfu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guangfu} }

S.FORM: Guangfu mki sku Hualien. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 131.63 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 28.44 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 5.67 km²), 10,741 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 3,865 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 6,982 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 65%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Amis ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Guangfu ays psgayun 14 ru 9 alang. 9 alang hani ga, Tafalong , Fata' an , Laso'ay , Alolong , Sado , Kalotong , O kakay , Atomo , Fahol .

Goangfo mki sko Hoalien. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 131.63 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 28.44 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 5.67 km²), 10,741 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 3,865 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 6,982 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 65%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Amis ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebo Goangfo ays psgayon 14 ro 9 alang. 9 alang hani ga, Tafalong , Fata' an , Laso'ay , Alolong , Sado , Kalotong , O kakay , Atomo , Fahol .
